text: İsmet-Duygu Akşit Oal (born 10 October 1971) is a retired Turkish female tennis player. Akşit Oal won four doubles titles on the ITF circuit in her career. On 9 October 2010, she reached her best singles ranking of world number 580. On 7 July 1997, she peaked at number 357 in the WTA doubles rankings. Playing for Turkey in Fed Cup, she has a win–loss record of 32–28.
